name: 2nd Edition Ceramic Gorillas Full Set
description:
Wow! The second edition of our fabulous gorilla ceramics are on their way!

Can't decide which one is your favourite? Well here's your chance to pre-order all five from the first batch, before they hit UK soil*

The set includes:
Elvis. Artist: Martin Band
Apescape (balloons) Artist: Charlie Ososki
Apple of my Eye (apples). Artist: Mark Lewis
Lipstick on the Gorilla (lips). Artist Adam Travers
Blue (blue glass effect). Artist Julia Tricky

Your gorilla comes in a lovely gift box, with a collectors card. 
Unlike the 1st edition this is not a limited run- but sign up to our website to receive information on upcoming limited edition designs (they're very exciting!)

* Delivery will take up to 6 weeks (mid Dec)

name: 2nd Edition Elvis Gorilla
description:
Wow! The King (Kong) is on his way! As part of our second edition gorilla ceramics we have recreated the amazing talent of Martin band in miniature from.

This is your chance to pre-order him from the first batch, before he hits UK soil*

Your gorilla comes in a lovely gift box, with a collectors card. 
Unlike the 1st edition this is not a limited run- but sign up to our website to receive information on upcoming limited edition designs (they're very exciting!)

* Delivery will take up to 6 weeks (mid Dec)

name: Paint Your Own
description:
The next batch of Paint Your Own ceramics are on their way!

This is your chance to pre-order from the first batch, before they hit UK soil*

Choose from:
Paint Your Own Gorilla
Paint Your Own Lion

Your PYO ceramic comes in a lovely card box with 5 acrylic paints and brush.

Recreate your favourite from the trial, create your very own masterpiece, or sign up to our website for more ideas.

* Delivery will take up to 6 weeks (mid Dec)

name: 1st Edition Ceramic Lions Full Set
description:
The perfect memento of Pride in Bournemouth. The complete collection contains all four lion ceramics: 

Santa Paws, by Natalie Guy
Temba, by Robyn Elderfield
Ted, by Robyn Elderfield
Hutty, by Natalie Guy

Your lion comes in a lovely gift box, with a collectors card. 

Sign up to our website to receive information on upcoming limited edition designs (they're very exciting!)

*Please note: orders for the Pride in Bournemouth Collection will be dispatched the week commencing the 5th December 2011.
